SEARCH
Package com.example.teamalfred.database

Class SqliteUserDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.teamalfred.database.SqliteUserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDAO
public class SqliteUserDAO extends Object implements UserDAO
This class implements the UserDAO interface specifically for a SQLite database. Contains SQL queries and JDBC code to interact with the user table.

    • findUserByEmail

      public Optional<User> findUserByEmail(String email) throws SQLException
      Finds a user by their email address.
      Specified by:
      findUserByEmail in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to search for.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found User, or an empty Optional if no user with that email exists.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • findUserById

      public Optional<User> findUserById(int id) throws SQLException
      Finds a user by their unique ID.
      Specified by:
      findUserById in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the user to find.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found User, or an empty Optional if no user with that ID exists.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all users from the database.
      Specified by:
      getAllUsers in interface UserDAO
      Returns:
      A List of all User objects; the list may be empty if there are no users.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
